body: Well "Methonium" quit drawing hentai to fully focus as "Synecdoche" with the "Elf-san wa Yaserarenai" manga. The issue lies in we not knowing if she will ever get back to being Methonium again and deliver delicious bbw. Many authors through the years who originally began as Hentai mangaka quit hentai forever after working on a big project of their own. As for fukumaaya, she quit when her baby was born, she rarely post an ecchi sketch/panel on her twitter/pixiv.
PRAISE muronaga! ..... please don't fucking quit like fukumaaya and Methonium u.u
